mapper.select: select decode(count(*),1, 'true', 0, 'false') from t_shopping_member where member_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SHOPPING_MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, HP1, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, subAddress, NAKWON_COIN ) VALUES ( #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hp1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAKWON_COIN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_SHOPPING_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR};
